item.title: Full of litter and broken bottles, 10th October
item.description:
There is flytipping activity taking place on stairs and next to it. Its way for people to drop kids to local school and stairs are full of broken bottles and other hazard oobjects.It would be beneficial to set up some kind of secure systems or cctv to make sure that it's safety for kids and discourage thoes who flytipping there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Tillingbourne Green, Poverest, London

item.title: Building material blocking pavement, 10th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Grand Union Crescent, Hackney, London
